name: Flatout!
description:
Its a no brake adventure - accelerated to the Max!

Your car’s accelerator pedal is stuck to the floor and you're speeding out of control with your vehicle getting faster and faster as your trying to manoeuvre your way through oncoming traffic, hills, tunnels, traffic intersections as well as the police riding on his tail for speeding!

With plenty of hills, thrills and spills, this is the next level out of control car crashing experience the mobile gaming world has been waiting for!

Features :
- Vast imagined open world, where you can decide to take different turns, tunnels, caves, fields and more.
- Choose your own high-speed adventure!
- Destructible vehicles – Cars are now able to take some damage without crashing completely. See the doors swing open and the bonnet of the car fly off!
